   32:          suite/0,
   33:          all/0,
   34:          groups/0,
   35:          init_per_suite/1,
   36:          end_per_suite/1,
   37:          init_per_group/2,
   38:          end_per_group/2,
   39:          init_per_testcase/2,
   40:          end_per_testcase/2
   41:         ]).
   42: 
   43: -export([
   44:          always_ok/1,
   45:          app_test/1,
   46:          appup_test/1,
   47:          basic_test/1,
   48:          check_error/1,
   49:          cli/1,
   50:          cli_exit_normal/1,
   51:          cli_exit_status/1,
   52:          close/1,
   53:          daemon_already_started/1,
   54:          daemon_error_closes_port/1,
   55:          daemon_opt_fd/1,
   56:          double_close/1,
   57:          exec/1,
   58:          exec_compressed/1,
   59:          exec_with_io_in/1,
   60:          exec_with_io_out/1,
   61:          host_equal/2,
   62:          idle_time_client/1,
   63:          idle_time_server/1,
   64:          inet6_option/0,
   65:          inet6_option/1,
   66:          inet_option/1,
   67:          internal_error/1,
   68:          ips/1,
   69:          key_callback/1,
   70:          key_callback_options/1,
   71:          known_hosts/1,
   72:          login_bad_pwd_no_retry1/1,
   73:          login_bad_pwd_no_retry2/1,
   74:          login_bad_pwd_no_retry3/1,
   75:          login_bad_pwd_no_retry4/1,
   76:          login_bad_pwd_no_retry5/1,
   77:          max_initial_idle_time/1,
   78:          misc_ssh_options/1,
   79:          multi_daemon_opt_fd/1,
   80:          openssh_zlib_basic_test/1,
   81:          packet_size/1,

   93:          ssh_file_is_auth_key/1,
   94:          ssh_file_is_host_key/0,
   95:          ssh_file_is_host_key/1,
   96:          ssh_file_is_host_key_misc/1,
   97:          ssh_info_print/1
   98:         ]).
   99: 
  100: 
  101: -define(NEWLINE, <<"\r\n">>).
  102: 
  103: -define(REKEY_DATA_TMO, 1 * 60000). % Should be multiples of 60000
  104: 
  105: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  106: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
  107: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  108: 
  109: suite() ->
  110:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
  111:      {timetrap,{seconds,90}}].
  112: 
  113: all() -> 
  114:     [{group, all_tests}
  115:     ].
  116: 
  117: -define(PARALLEL, parallel).
  118: 
  119: groups() ->
  120:     [{all_tests, [?PARALLEL], [{group, sequential},
  121:                                {group, p_basic},
  122:                                {group, internal_error},
  123:                                {group, login_bad_pwd_no_retry},
  124:                                {group, key_cb}]},
  125:      {sequential, [], [app_test,
  126:                        appup_test,
  127:                        daemon_already_started,
  128:                        daemon_error_closes_port, % Should be re-written..
  129:                        double_close,
  130:                        daemon_opt_fd,
  131:                        multi_daemon_opt_fd,
  132:                        packet_size,
  133:                        ssh_info_print,
  134:                        shell_exit_status,
  135:                        setopts_getopts,
  136:                        known_hosts,
  137:                        ssh_file_is_host_key,
  138:                        ssh_file_is_host_key_misc,
  139:                        ssh_file_is_auth_key]},
  140:      {key_cb, [?PARALLEL], [key_callback, key_callback_options]},
  141:      {internal_error, [?PARALLEL], [internal_error]},
  142:      {login_bad_pwd_no_retry, [?PARALLEL], [login_bad_pwd_no_retry1,
  143:                                             login_bad_pwd_no_retry2,
  144:                                             login_bad_pwd_no_retry3,
  145:                                             login_bad_pwd_no_retry4,
  146:                                             login_bad_pwd_no_retry5]},
  147:      {p_basic, [?PARALLEL], [send, parallel_login, peername_sockname,
  148:                              exec, exec_compressed,
  149:                              exec_with_io_out, exec_with_io_in,
  150:                              cli, cli_exit_normal, cli_exit_status,
  151:                              idle_time_client, idle_time_server,
  152:                              max_initial_idle_time,
  153:                              openssh_zlib_basic_test,
  154:                              misc_ssh_options, inet_option, inet6_option,
  155:                              shell, shell_socket, shell_ssh_conn,
  156:                              shell_no_unicode, shell_unicode_string,
  157:                              close]}].
  158: 
  159: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  160: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  161:     ?CHECK_CRYPTO(begin
  162:                       ssh:start(),
  163:                       ct:log("Pub keys setup for: ~p",
  164:                              [ssh_test_lib:setup_all_user_host_keys(Config)]),
  165:                       Config
  166:                   end).
  167: 
  168: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  169:     ssh:stop().
  170: 
  171: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  172: init_per_group(key_cb, Config) ->
  173:     case lists:member('ssh-rsa',
  174: 		      ssh_transport:supported_algorithms(public_key)) of
  175: 	true ->
  176:             DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  177:             PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  178:             ssh_test_lib:setup_user_key('ssh-rsa', DataDir, PrivDir),
  179:             ssh_test_lib:setup_host_key_create_dir('ssh-rsa', DataDir, PrivDir),
  180:             Config;
  181: 	false ->
  182: 	    {skip, unsupported_pub_key}
  183:     end;
  184: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
  185:     Config.
  186: 
  187: 
  188: end_per_group(_, Config) ->
  189:     Config.
  190: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  191: init_per_testcase(TC, Config) when TC==shell_no_unicode ; 
  192: 				   TC==shell_unicode_string ->
  193:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  194:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  195:     SysDir =  proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  196:     Sftpd = {_Pid, _Host, Port} =       
  197: 	ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  198: 			     {user_dir, PrivDir},
  199: 			     {user_passwords, [{"foo", "bar"}]}]),
  200:     ct:sleep(500),
  201:     IO = ssh_test_lib:start_io_server(),
  202:     Shell = ssh_test_lib:start_shell(Port, IO, [{user_dir,UserDir},
  203: 						{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  204: 						{user,"foo"},{password,"bar"}]),
  205:     ct:log("IO=~p, Shell=~p, self()=~p",[IO,Shell,self()]),
  206:     ct:log("file:native_name_encoding() = ~p,~nio:getopts() = ~p",
  207: 	   [file:native_name_encoding(),io:getopts()]),
  208:     wait_for_erlang_first_line([{io,IO}, {shell,Shell}, {sftpd, Sftpd}  | Config]);
  209: 
  210: init_per_testcase(inet6_option, Config) ->
  211:     case ssh_test_lib:has_inet6_address() of
  212: 	true ->
  213: 	    init_per_testcase('__default__', Config);
  214: 	false ->
  215: 	    {skip,"No ipv6 interface address"}
  216:     end;
  217: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  218:     Config.
  219: 
  220: end_per_testcase(TC, Config) when TC==shell_no_unicode ; 
  221: 				  TC==shell_unicode_string ->
  222:     case proplists:get_value(sftpd, Config) of
  223: 	{Pid, _, _} ->
  224: 	    catch ssh:stop_daemon(Pid);
  225: 	_ ->
  226: 	    ok
  227:     end,
  228:     end_per_testcase(Config);
  229: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  230:     end_per_testcase(Config).
  231: 
  232: end_per_testcase(_Config) ->
  233:     ok.
  234: 
  235: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  236: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  237: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  238: %%% Application consistency test.
  239: app_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  240:     test_server:app_test(ssh),
  241:     ok.
  242: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  243: %%% Appup file consistency test.
  244: appup_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  245:     ok = test_server:appup_test(ssh).
  246: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  247: %%% Test that we can set some misc options not tested elsewhere
  248: %%% some options not yet present are not decided if we should support or
  249: %%% if they need their own test case.
  250: misc_ssh_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->  
  251:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  252:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  253:     
  254:     CMiscOpt0 = [{connect_timeout, 1000}, {user_dir, UserDir}, {silently_accept_hosts, true}],
  255:     CMiscOpt1 = [{connect_timeout, infinity}, {user_dir, UserDir}, {silently_accept_hosts, true}],
  256:     SMiscOpt0 =  [{user_dir, UserDir}, {system_dir, SystemDir}],
  257:     SMiscOpt1 =  [{user_dir, UserDir}, {system_dir, SystemDir}],
  258: 
  259:     basic_test([{client_opts, CMiscOpt0}, {server_opts, SMiscOpt0}]),
  260:     basic_test([{client_opts, CMiscOpt1}, {server_opts, SMiscOpt1}]).
  261: 
  262: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  263: %%% Test configuring IPv4
  264: inet_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->   
  265:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  266:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  267:     
  268:     ClientOpts =  [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  269: 		   {user_dir, UserDir},
  270: 		   {user_interaction, false}],
  271:     ServerOpts = [{system_dir, SystemDir},
  272: 		  {user_dir, UserDir},
  273: 		  {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}], 
  274: 
  275:     basic_test([{client_opts, [{inet, inet} | ClientOpts]}, 
  276: 		{server_opts, [{inet, inet} | ServerOpts]}]).
  277: 
  278: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  279: %%% Test configuring IPv6
  280: inet6_option() -> [{timetrap,{seconds,30}}].
  281: inet6_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->   
  282:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  283:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  284:     
  285:     ClientOpts =  [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  286: 		   {user_dir, UserDir},
  287: 		   {user_interaction, false}],
  288:     ServerOpts = [{system_dir, SystemDir},
  289: 		  {user_dir, UserDir},
  290: 		  {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}], 
  291: 
  292:     basic_test([{client_opts, [{inet, inet6} | ClientOpts]}, 
  293: 		{server_opts, [{inet, inet6} | ServerOpts]}]).
  294: 
  295: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  296: %%% Test api function ssh_connection:exec
  297: exec(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  298:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  299:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  300:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  301:     
  302:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  303: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  304: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  305:     ConnectionRef =
  306: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  307: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  308: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  309:     {ok, ChannelId0} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  310:     success = ssh_connection:exec(ConnectionRef, ChannelId0,
  311: 				  "1+1.", infinity),
  312:     Data0 = {ssh_cm, ConnectionRef, {data, ChannelId0, 0, <<"2">>}},
  313:     case ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_result(Data0) of
  314: 	expected ->
  315: 	    ok;
  316: 	Other0 ->
  317: 	    ct:fail(Other0)
  318:     end,
  319:     ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_end(ConnectionRef, ChannelId0),
  320: 
  321:     %% Test that it is possible to start a new channel and
  322:     %% run an other exec on the same connection.
  323:     {ok, ChannelId1} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  324:     success = ssh_connection:exec(ConnectionRef, ChannelId1,
  325: 				  "2+2.", infinity),
  326:     Data1 = {ssh_cm, ConnectionRef, {data, ChannelId1, 0, <<"4">>}},
  327:     case ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_result(Data1) of
  328: 	expected ->
  329: 	    ok;
  330: 	Other1 ->
  331: 	    ct:fail(Other1)
  332:     end,
  333:     ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_end(ConnectionRef, ChannelId1),
  334:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  335:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  336: 
  337: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  338: %%% Test api function ssh_connection:exec with erlang server and the Command
  339: %%% makes io
  340: exec_with_io_out(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  341:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  342:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  343:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  344:     
  345:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  346: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  347: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  348:     ConnectionRef =
  349: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  350: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  351: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  352:     {ok, ChannelId0} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  353:     success = ssh_connection:exec(ConnectionRef, ChannelId0,
  354: 				  "io:write(hej).", infinity),
  355:     case ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_result(
  356:            [{ssh_cm, ConnectionRef, {data, ChannelId0, 0, <<"hej">>}},
  357:             {ssh_cm, ConnectionRef, {data, ChannelId0, 0, <<"ok">>}},
  358:             {ssh_cm, ConnectionRef, {eof, ChannelId0}},
  359:             {ssh_cm, ConnectionRef, {exit_status, ChannelId0, 0}},
  360:             {ssh_cm, ConnectionRef, {closed, ChannelId0}}
  361:            ]) of
  362:         expected ->
  363:             ok;
  364:         Other0 ->
  365: 	    ct:fail(Other0)
  366:     end,
  367:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  368:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  369: 
  370: exec_with_io_in(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  371:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  372:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  373:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  374:     
  375:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  376: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  377: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  378:     C = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  379: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  380: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  381:     {ok, Ch} = ssh_connection:session_channel(C, infinity),
  382:     ssh_connection:exec(C, Ch, "io:read('% ').", 1000),
  383: 
  384:     ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_result_or_fail({ssh_cm, C, {data,Ch,0,<<"% ">>}}),
  385:     ok = ssh_connection:send(C, Ch, "hej.\n", 10000),
  386: 
  387:     ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_result_or_fail({ssh_cm, C, {data,Ch,0,<<"{ok,hej}">>}}),
  388:     ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_end(C, Ch),
  389:     ssh:close(C),
  390:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  391: 
  392: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  393: %%% Test that compression option works
  394: exec_compressed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  395:     case ssh_test_lib:ssh_supports(zlib, compression) of
  396: 	false ->
  397: 	    {skip, "zlib compression is not supported"};
  398: 
  399: 	true ->
  400: 	    process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  401: 	    SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  402: 	    UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
  403: 
  404: 	    {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},{user_dir, UserDir},
  405: 						     {preferred_algorithms,[{compression, [zlib]}]},
  406: 						     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  407:     
  408: 	    ConnectionRef =
  409: 		ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  410: 						  {user_dir, UserDir},
  411: 						  {user_interaction, false}]),
  412: 	    {ok, ChannelId} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  413: 	    success = ssh_connection:exec(ConnectionRef, ChannelId,
  414: 					  "1+1.", infinity),
  415: 	    Data = {ssh_cm, ConnectionRef, {data, ChannelId, 0, <<"2">>}},
  416: 	    case ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_result(Data) of
  417: 		expected ->
  418: 		    ok;
  419: 		Other ->
  420: 		    ct:fail(Other)
  421: 	    end,
  422: 	    ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_end(ConnectionRef, ChannelId),
  423: 	    ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  424: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid)
  425:     end.
  426: 
  427: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  428: %%% Idle timeout test
  429: idle_time_client(Config) -> idle_time_common([], [{idle_time, 2000}], Config).
  430: 
  431: idle_time_server(Config) -> idle_time_common([{idle_time, 2000}], [], Config).
  432: 
  433: 
  434: idle_time_common(DaemonExtraOpts, ClientExtraOpts, Config) ->
  435:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  436:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  437: 
  438:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  439: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  440: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}
  441:                                              | DaemonExtraOpts
  442:                                             ]),
  443:     ConnectionRef =
  444: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  445: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  446: 					  {user_interaction, false}
  447:                                           | ClientExtraOpts
  448:                                          ]),
  449:     {ok, Id1} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(ConnectionRef),
  450:     {ok, Id2} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(ConnectionRef),
  451:     ssh_sftp:stop_channel(Id2),
  452:     timer:sleep(2500),
  453:     {ok, Id3} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(ConnectionRef),
  454:     ssh_sftp:stop_channel(Id1),
  455:     ssh_sftp:stop_channel(Id3),
  456:     timer:sleep(1000),
  457:     {ok, Id4} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(ConnectionRef),
  458:     timer:sleep(2500),
  459:     {ok, Id5} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(ConnectionRef),
  460:     ssh_sftp:stop_channel(Id4),
  461:     ssh_sftp:stop_channel(Id5),
  462:     receive
  463:     after 10000 ->
  464: 	    {error, closed} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, 1000)
  465:     end,
  466:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  467: 
  468: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  469: max_initial_idle_time(Config) ->
  470:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  471:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  472: 
  473:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  474: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  475: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  476:                                              {max_initial_idle_time, 2000}
  477:                                             ]),
  478:     ConnectionRef =
  479: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  480: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  481: 					  {user_interaction, false}
  482:                                          ]),
  483:     timer:sleep(8000),
  484:     {error, closed} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, 1000),
  485:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  486: 
  487: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  488: %%% Test that ssh:shell/2 works
  489: shell(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  490:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  491:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  492:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  493:    
  494:     {_Pid, _Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},{user_dir, UserDir},
  495: 					       {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  496:     ct:sleep(500),
  497: 
  498:     IO = ssh_test_lib:start_io_server(),
  499:     Shell = ssh_test_lib:start_shell(Port, IO, [{user_dir,UserDir}]),
  500:     receive
  501: 	{'EXIT', _, _} = Exit ->
  502:             ct:log("~p:~p ~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,Exit]),
  503: 	    ct:fail(no_ssh_connection);  
  504: 	ErlShellStart ->
  505: 	    ct:log("Erlang shell start: ~p~n", [ErlShellStart]),
  506: 	    do_shell(IO, Shell)
  507:     after 
  508: 	30000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
  509:     end.
  510:     
  511: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  512: %%% Test that ssh:shell/2 works when attaching to a open TCP-connection
  513: shell_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  514:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  515:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  516:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  517: 
  518:     {_Pid, Host0, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},{user_dir, UserDir},
  519: 					       {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  520:     Host = ssh_test_lib:mangle_connect_address(Host0),
  521:     ct:sleep(500),
  522: 
  523:     %% First test with active mode:
  524:     {ok,ActiveSock} = gen_tcp:connect(Host,
  525:                                       Port,
  526:                                       [{active,true}]),
  527:     {error,not_passive_mode} = ssh:shell(ActiveSock),
  528:     ct:log("~p:~p active tcp socket failed ok", [?MODULE,?LINE]),
  529:     gen_tcp:close(ActiveSock),
  530: 
  531:     %% Secondly, test with an UDP socket:
  532:     {ok,BadSock} = gen_udp:open(0),
  533:     {error,not_tcp_socket} = ssh:shell(BadSock),
  534:     ct:log("~p:~p udp socket failed ok", [?MODULE,?LINE]),
  535:     gen_udp:close(BadSock),
  536: 
  537:     %% And finally test with passive mode (which should work):
  538:     IO = ssh_test_lib:start_io_server(),
  539:     {ok,Sock} = gen_tcp:connect(Host, Port, [{active,false}]),
  540:     Shell = ssh_test_lib:start_shell(Sock, IO, [{user_dir,UserDir}]),
  541:     gen_tcp:controlling_process(Sock, Shell),
  542:     Shell ! start,
  543: 
  544:     receive
  545: 	{'EXIT', _, _} = Exit ->
  546:             ct:log("~p:~p ~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,Exit]),
  547: 	    ct:fail(no_ssh_connection);
  548: 	ErlShellStart ->
  549: 	    ct:log("Erlang shell start: ~p~n", [ErlShellStart]),
  550: 	    do_shell(IO, Shell)
  551:     after
  552: 	30000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
  553:     end.
  554: 
  555: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  556: %%% Test that ssh:shell/2 works when attaching to a open SSH-connection
  557: shell_ssh_conn(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  558:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  559:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  560:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  561: 
  562:     {_Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},{user_dir, UserDir},
  563: 					       {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  564:     ct:sleep(500),
  565: 
  566:     IO = ssh_test_lib:start_io_server(),
  567:     C = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  568:                                       {user_dir, UserDir},
  569:                                       {user_interaction, false}]),
  570:     Shell = ssh_test_lib:start_shell(C, IO, undefined),
  571:     receive
  572: 	{'EXIT', _, _} = Exit ->
  573:             ct:log("~p:~p ~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,Exit]),
  574: 	    ct:fail(no_ssh_connection);
  575: 	ErlShellStart ->
  576: 	    ct:log("Erlang shell start: ~p~n", [ErlShellStart]),
  577: 	    do_shell(IO, Shell)
  578:     after
  579: 	30000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
  580:     end.
  581: 
  582: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  583: cli(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  584:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  585:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  586:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  587:     
  588:     TmpDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config), "tmp"),
  589:     ok = ssh_test_lib:del_dirs(TmpDir),
  590:     ok = file:make_dir(TmpDir),
  591: 
  592:     {_Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},{user_dir, UserDir},
  593: 					       {password, "morot"},
  594: 					       {ssh_cli, {ssh_test_cli, [cli,TmpDir]}}, 
  595: 					       {subsystems, []},
  596: 					       {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  597:     ct:sleep(500),
  598:     
  599:     ConnectionRef = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  600: 						      {user, "foo"},
  601: 						      {password, "morot"},
  602: 						      {user_interaction, false},
  603: 						      {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  604:     
  605:     {ok, ChannelId} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  606:     ssh_connection:shell(ConnectionRef, ChannelId),
  607:     ssh_connection:send(ConnectionRef, ChannelId, <<"q">>),
  608:     receive 
  609: 	{ssh_cm, ConnectionRef,
  610: 	 {data,0,0, <<"\r\nYou are accessing a dummy, type \"q\" to exit\r\n\n">>}} ->
  611: 	    ssh_connection:send(ConnectionRef, ChannelId, <<"q">>)
  612:     after 
  613: 	30000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
  614:     end,
  615:     
  616:     receive 
  617:      	{ssh_cm, ConnectionRef,{closed, ChannelId}} ->
  618:      	    ok
  619:     after 
  620: 	30000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
  621:     end.
  622: 
  623: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  624: %%% Test that SSH client receives exit-status 0 on successful command execution
  625: cli_exit_normal(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  626:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  627:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  628:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  629: 
  630:     {_Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},{user_dir, UserDir},
  631:                            {password, "morot"},
  632:                            {ssh_cli, {ssh_cli, [fun (_) -> spawn(fun () -> ok end) end]}},
  633:                            {subsystems, []},
  634:                            {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  635:     ct:sleep(500),
  636: 
  637:     ConnectionRef = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  638:                               {user, "foo"},
  639:                               {password, "morot"},
  640:                               {user_interaction, false},
  641:                               {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  642: 
  643:     {ok, ChannelId} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  644:     ssh_connection:shell(ConnectionRef, ChannelId),
  645:     ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_end(ConnectionRef, ChannelId, _ExpectedExitStatus = 0).
  646: 
  647: %%---------------------------------------------------------
  648: %%% Test that SSH client receives user provided exit-status
  649: cli_exit_status(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  650:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  651:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  652:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  653:     NonZeroExitStatus = 7,
  654: 
  655:     {_Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},{user_dir, UserDir},
  656:                            {password, "morot"},
  657:                            {ssh_cli, {ssh_cli, [fun (_) ->
  658:                                                         spawn(fun () -> exit({exit_status, NonZeroExitStatus}) end)
  659:                                                 end]}},
  660:                            {subsystems, []},
  661:                            {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  662:     ct:sleep(500),
  663: 
  664:     ConnectionRef = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  665:                               {user, "foo"},
  666:                               {password, "morot"},
  667:                               {user_interaction, false},
  668:                               {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  669: 
  670:     {ok, ChannelId} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  671:     ssh_connection:shell(ConnectionRef, ChannelId),
  672:     ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_end(ConnectionRef, ChannelId, NonZeroExitStatus).
  673: 
  674: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  675: %%% Test that get correct error message if you try to start a daemon
  676: %%% on an address that already runs a daemon see also seq10667
  677: daemon_already_started(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  678:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  679:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  680: 
  681:     {Pid, _Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  682: 					      {user_dir, UserDir},
  683: 					      {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  684:     {error, eaddrinuse} = ssh_test_lib:daemon(Port, [{system_dir, SystemDir},
  685: 						     {user_dir, UserDir},
  686: 						     {failfun,
  687: 						      fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  688:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  689: 
  690: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  691: %%% Test that a failed daemon start does not leave the port open
  692: 
  693: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% REWRITE! %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  694: %%% 1) check that {error,_} is not  {error,eaddrinuse}
  695: %%% 2) instead of ssh_test_lib:daemon second time, use gen_tcp:listen
  696: 
  697: daemon_error_closes_port(Config) ->
  698:     GoodSystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  699:     Port = inet_port(),
  700:     {error,_} = ssh_test_lib:daemon(Port, []), % No system dir
  701:     case ssh_test_lib:daemon(Port, [{system_dir, GoodSystemDir}]) of
  702:         {error,eaddrinuse} ->
  703:             {fail, "Port leakage"};
  704:         {error,Error} ->
  705:             ct:log("Strange error: ~p",[Error]),
  706:             {fail, "Strange error"};
  707:         {Pid, _Host, Port} ->
  708:             %% Ok
  709:             ssh:stop_daemon(Pid)
  710:     end.
  711:     
  712: inet_port() ->
  713:     {ok, Socket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{reuseaddr, true}]),
  714:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(Socket),
  715:     gen_tcp:close(Socket),
  716:     Port.
  717: 
  718: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  719: %%% check that known_hosts is updated correctly
  720: known_hosts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  721:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  722:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
  723:     
  724:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{user_dir, PrivDir},{system_dir, SystemDir},
  725: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  726: 
  727:     KnownHosts = filename:join(PrivDir, "known_hosts"),
  728:     file:delete(KnownHosts),
  729:     {error, enoent} = file:read_file(KnownHosts),
  730:     ConnectionRef =
  731: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{user_dir, PrivDir},
  732: 					  {user_interaction, false},
  733: 					  {silently_accept_hosts, true},
  734:                                           {save_accepted_host, true}
  735:                                          ]),
  736:     {ok, _Channel} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  737:     ok = ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  738:     {ok, Binary} = file:read_file(KnownHosts),
  739:     ct:log("known_hosts:~n~p",[Binary]),
  740:     Lines = string:tokens(binary_to_list(Binary), "\n"),
  741:     [Line] = Lines,
  742:     [HostAndIp, Alg, _KeyData] = string:tokens(Line, " "),
  743: 
  744:     {StoredHost,StoredPort} =
  745:         case HostAndIp of
  746:             "["++X -> [Hpart,":"++Pstr] = string:tokens(X, "]"),
  747:                       {Hpart,list_to_integer(Pstr)};
  748:             _ -> {HostAndIp,Port}
  749:         end,
  750:     
  751:     true = ssh_test_lib:match_ip(StoredHost, Host) andalso (Port==StoredPort),
  752:     "ssh-" ++ _ = Alg,
  753:     NLines = length(binary:split(Binary, <<"\n">>, [global,trim_all])),
  754:     ct:log("NLines = ~p~n~p", [NLines,Binary]),
  755:     if
  756:         NLines>1 -> ct:fail("wrong num lines", []);
  757:         NLines<1 -> ct:fail("wrong num lines", []);
  758:         true -> ok
  759:     end,
  760: 
  761:     _ConnectionRef2 =
  762: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{user_dir, PrivDir},
  763: 					  {user_interaction, false},
  764: 					  {silently_accept_hosts, true},
  765:                                           {save_accepted_host, true}
  766:                                          ]),
  767:     {ok, Binary2} = file:read_file(KnownHosts),
  768:     case Binary of
  769:         Binary2 -> ok;
  770:         _ -> ct:log("2nd differ~n~p", [Binary2]),
  771:              ct:fail("wrong num lines", [])
  772:     end,
  773: 
  774:     Binary3 = <<"localhost,",Binary/binary>>,
  775:     ok = file:write_file(KnownHosts, Binary3),
  776:      _ConnectionRef3 =
  777: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{user_dir, PrivDir},
  778: 					  {user_interaction, false},
  779: 					  {silently_accept_hosts, true},
  780:                                           {save_accepted_host, true}
  781:                                          ]),
  782:     ct:log("New known_hosts:~n~p",[Binary3]),
  783:     {ok, Binary4} = file:read_file(KnownHosts),
  784:     case Binary3 of
  785:         Binary4 -> ok;
  786:         _ -> ct:log("2nd differ~n~p", [Binary4]),
  787:              ct:fail("wrong num lines", [])
  788:     end,
  789: 
  790: 
  791:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  792: 
  793: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  794: ssh_file_is_host_key() -> [{timetrap,{seconds,240}}]. % Some machines are S L O W !
  795: ssh_file_is_host_key(Config) ->
  796:     Dir = ssh_test_lib:create_random_dir(Config),
  797:     ct:log("Dir = ~p", [Dir]),
  798:     KnownHosts = filename:join(Dir, "known_hosts"),
  799: 
  800:     Key1 = {#'ECPoint'{point = <<73,72,235,162,96,101,154,59,217,114,123,192,96,105,250,29,
  801:                                  214,76,60,63,167,21,221,118,246,168,152,2,7,172,137,125>>},
  802:             {namedCurve,?'id-Ed25519'}},
  803:     Key2 = {#'ECPoint'{point = <<95,215,68,155,89,180,97,253,44,231,135,236,97,106,212,106,29,
  804:                                  161,52,36,133,167,14,31,138,14,167,93,128,233,103,120,237,241,
  805:                                  36,118,155,70,199,6,27,214,120,61,241,229,15,108,209,250,26,
  806:                                  190,175,232,37,97,128>>},
  807:             {namedCurve,?'id-Ed448'}},
  808:     Key3 = {'RSAPublicKey',26565213557098441060571713941539431805641814292761836797158846333985276408616038302348064841541244792430014595960643885863857366044141899534486816837416587694213836843799730043696945690516841209754307951050689906601353687467659852190777927968674989320642319504162787468947018505175948989102544757855693228490011564030927714896252701919941617689227585365348356580525802093985552564228730275431222515673065363441446158870936027338182083252824862151536327733046243804704721201548991176621134884093279416695997338124856506800535228380202243308550318880784741179703553922258881924287662178348044420509921666661119986374777,
  809:             65537},
  810: 
  811:     FileContents = <<"h11,h12,[h13]:*,h14 ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIElI66JgZZo72XJ7wGBp+h3WTDw/pxXddvaomAIHrIl9\n",
  812:                      "h21,[h22]:2345,h23 ssh-ed448 AAAACXNzaC1lZDQ0OAAAADlf10SbWbRh/Sznh+xhatRqHaE0JIWnDh"
  813:                                                              "+KDqddgOlneO3xJHabRscGG9Z4PfHlD2zR+hq+r+glYYA=\n",
  814:                      "  \n",
  815:                      "\n",
  816:                      "h31 ssh-rsa AAAAB3NzaC1yc2EAAAADAQABAAABAQDSb+D77XKvkMDWGu05CD6gWlEXJ+exSvxmegU1pvicPds090qTK3HwSzV7Hg1YVEV6bUiO74Om9Da4EMQponiSeLfVlIkBY5Ko4am4HMNOPTi5Ac4zR1B36nPvyTJluHKOZiCE0ZkSjKYvLEua0Y4Gqd+4RS93Q6r31OO8ukEVM+gG7z0tvhVLkAo8G5QnGRPW0z11tkfEeyjJzhk8H+4lmNjJRK4m6z71P0ACAEBJCpYKpKY3+AjksWuEZnWLgfuk9aPI4q8tI/TO3lF1BmyTPj7/QTFMiWgL7lNM94oaRHTjZ1CdB0UAW1+TMABu155z5KxVUIzrMoVKGBmJPhh5"
  817:                    >>,
  818:     ok = file:write_file(KnownHosts, FileContents),
  819: 
  820:     true = ssh_file:is_host_key(Key1, "h11",   22, 'ssh-ed25519', [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  821:     true = ssh_file:is_host_key(Key1, "h12",   22, 'ssh-ed25519', [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  822:     true = ssh_file:is_host_key(Key1, "h13", 1234, 'ssh-ed25519', [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  823:     true = ssh_file:is_host_key(Key1, "h13",   22, 'ssh-ed25519', [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  824:     true = ssh_file:is_host_key(Key1, "h14",   22, 'ssh-ed25519', [{user_dir,Dir}]),

  827:     true = ssh_file:is_host_key(Key1, ["noh1","h11"],        22, 'ssh-ed25519', [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  828:     true = ssh_file:is_host_key(Key1, ["noh1","h12","noh2"], 22, 'ssh-ed25519', [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  829: 
  830:     true = ssh_file:is_host_key(Key2, "h21",   22, 'ssh-ed448', [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  831:     false= ssh_file:is_host_key(Key2, "h22",   22, 'ssh-ed448', [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  832:     true = ssh_file:is_host_key(Key2, "h22", 2345, 'ssh-ed448', [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  833:     false= ssh_file:is_host_key(Key2, "h22", 1234, 'ssh-ed448', [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  834:     true = ssh_file:is_host_key(Key2, "h23",   22, 'ssh-ed448', [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  835:     
  836:     false =  ssh_file:is_host_key(Key2, "h11", 22, 'ssh-ed448', [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  837:     false =  ssh_file:is_host_key(Key1, "h21", 22, 'ssh-ed25519', [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  838: 
  839:     true = ssh_file:is_host_key(Key3, "h31",   22, 'ssh-rsa',     [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  840:     true = ssh_file:is_host_key(Key3, "h31",   22, 'rsa-sha2-256',[{user_dir,Dir}]),
  841: 
  842:     ok.
  843: 
  844: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  845: ssh_file_is_host_key_misc(Config) ->
  846:     Dir = ssh_test_lib:create_random_dir(Config),
  847:     ct:log("Dir = ~p", [Dir]),
  848:     KnownHosts = filename:join(Dir, "known_hosts"),
  849: 
  850:     Key1 = {#'ECPoint'{point = <<73,72,235,162,96,101,154,59,217,114,123,192,96,105,250,29,
  851:                                  214,76,60,63,167,21,221,118,246,168,152,2,7,172,137,125>>},
  852:             {namedCurve,?'id-Ed25519'}},
  853:     Key2 = {#'ECPoint'{point = <<95,215,68,155,89,180,97,253,44,231,135,236,97,106,212,106,29,
  854:                                  161,52,36,133,167,14,31,138,14,167,93,128,233,103,120,237,241,
  855:                                  36,118,155,70,199,6,27,214,120,61,241,229,15,108,209,250,26,
  856:                                  190,175,232,37,97,128>>},
  857:             {namedCurve,?'id-Ed448'}},
  858:     FileContents = <<"h11,h12,!h12 ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIElI66JgZZo72XJ7wGBp+h3WTDw/pxXddvaomAIHrIl9\n",
  859:                      %% Key revoked later in file:
  860:                      "h22 ssh-ed448 AAAACXNzaC1lZDQ0OAAAADlf10SbWbRh/Sznh+xhatRqHaE0JIWnDh"
  861:                                                              "+KDqddgOlneO3xJHabRscGG9Z4PfHlD2zR+hq+r+glYYA=\n",
  862:                      "@revoked h22 ssh-ed448 AAAACXNzaC1lZDQ0OAAAADlf10SbWbRh/Sznh+xhatRqHaE0JIWnDh"
  863:                                                              "+KDqddgOlneO3xJHabRscGG9Z4PfHlD2zR+hq+r+glYYA=\n",
  864:                      "h21 ssh-ed448 AAAACXNzaC1lZDQ0OAAAADlf10SbWbRh/Sznh+xhatRqHaE0JIWnDh"
  865:                                                              "+KDqddgOlneO3xJHabRscGG9Z4PfHlD2zR+hq+r+glYYA=\n"
  866:                    >>,
  867:     ok = file:write_file(KnownHosts, FileContents),
  868: 
  869:     true = ssh_file:is_host_key(Key1, "h11",   22, 'ssh-ed25519', [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  870:     true = ssh_file:is_host_key(Key2, "h21",   22, 'ssh-ed448',   [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  871: 
  872:     true = ssh_file:is_host_key(Key2, "h21",   22, 'ssh-ed448',   [{user_dir,Dir},
  873:                                                                    {key_cb_private,[{optimize,space}]}]),
  874:     %% Check revoked key:
  875:     {error,revoked_key} =
  876:         ssh_file:is_host_key(Key2, "h22",   22, 'ssh-ed448',   [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  877:     {error,revoked_key} =
  878:         ssh_file:is_host_key(Key2, "h22",   22, 'ssh-ed448',   [{user_dir,Dir},
  879:                                                                 {key_cb_private,[{optimize,space}]}]),
  880:     %% Check key with "!" in pattern:
  881:     false= ssh_file:is_host_key(Key1, "h12",   22, 'ssh-ed25519', [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  882: 
  883:     ok.
  884: 
  885: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  886: ssh_file_is_auth_key(Config) ->
  887:     Dir = ssh_test_lib:create_random_dir(Config),
  888:     ct:log("Dir = ~p", [Dir]),
  889:     AuthKeys = filename:join(Dir, "authorized_keys"),
  890: 
  891:     Key1 = {#'ECPoint'{point = <<73,72,235,162,96,101,154,59,217,114,123,192,96,105,250,29,
  892:                                  214,76,60,63,167,21,221,118,246,168,152,2,7,172,137,125>>},
  893:             {namedCurve,?'id-Ed25519'}},
  894:     Key2 = {#'ECPoint'{point = <<95,215,68,155,89,180,97,253,44,231,135,236,97,106,212,106,29,
  895:                                  161,52,36,133,167,14,31,138,14,167,93,128,233,103,120,237,241,
  896:                                  36,118,155,70,199,6,27,214,120,61,241,229,15,108,209,250,26,
  897:                                  190,175,232,37,97,128>>},
  898:             {namedCurve,?'id-Ed448'}},
  899:     FileContents = <<" \n",
  900:                      "# A test file\n",
  901:                      "ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIElI66JgZZo72XJ7wGBp+h3WTDw/pxXddvaomAIHrIl9 foo@example.com\n",
  902:                      "no-X11-forwarding,pty ssh-ed448 AAAACXNzaC1lZDQ0OAAAADlf10SbWbRh/Sznh+xhatRqHaE0JIWnDh"
  903:                                                              "+KDqddgOlneO3xJHabRscGG9Z4PfHlD2zR+hq+r+glYYA= bar@example.com\n"
  904:                    >>,
  905:     ok = file:write_file(AuthKeys, FileContents),
  906: 
  907:     true = ssh_file:is_auth_key(Key1, "donald_duck", [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  908:     true = ssh_file:is_auth_key(Key2, "mickey_mouse", [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  909: 
  910:     true = ssh_file:is_auth_key(Key1, "donald_duck", [{user_dir,Dir},{key_cb_private,[{optimize,space}]}]),
  911:     true = ssh_file:is_auth_key(Key2, "mickey_mouse", [{user_dir,Dir},{key_cb_private,[{optimize,space}]}]),
  912: 
  913:     ok.
  914: 
  915: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  916: 
  917: %%% Test that we can use keyes protected by pass phrases
  918: pass_phrase(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  919:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  920:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  921:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  922:     PhraseArg = proplists:get_value(pass_phrase, Config),
  923: 
  924:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  925: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  926: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  927:     ConnectionRef =
  928: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  929: 					  PhraseArg,
  930: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  931: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  932:     {ok, _ChannelId} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  933:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  934: 
  935: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  936: %%% Test that we can use key callback
  937: key_callback(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  938:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),

  940:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  941:     NoPubKeyDir = filename:join(UserDir, "nopubkey"),
  942:     file:make_dir(NoPubKeyDir),
  943: 
  944:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  945: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  946: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  947: 
  948:     ConnectOpts = [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  949:                    {user_dir, NoPubKeyDir},
  950:                    {user_interaction, false},
  951:                    {key_cb, ssh_key_cb}],
  952: 
  953:     ConnectionRef = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, ConnectOpts),
  954: 
  955:     {ok, _ChannelId} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  956:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  957:

  970:                                              {user_dir, UserDir},
  971:                                              {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  972: 
  973:     {ok, PrivKey} = file:read_file(filename:join(UserDir, "id_rsa")),
  974:

  976:                    {user_dir, NoPubKeyDir},

  981: 
  982:     {ok, _ChannelId} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  983:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).

  986: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  987: %%% Test that client does not hang if disconnects due to internal error
  988: internal_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  989:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  990:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  991:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  992:     SystemDir = filename:join(PrivDir, system),
  993:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  994:                                              {user_dir, UserDir},
  995:                                              {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  996: 
  997:     %% Now provoke an error in the following connect:
  998:     file:delete(filename:join(PrivDir, "system/ssh_host_rsa_key")), 
  999:     file:delete(filename:join(PrivDir, "system/ssh_host_dsa_key")), 
 1000:     file:delete(filename:join(PrivDir, "system/ssh_host_ecdsa_key")),
 1001:     file:delete(filename:join(PrivDir, "system/ssh_host_ed25519_key")), 
 1002:     file:delete(filename:join(PrivDir, "system/ssh_host_ed448_key")), 
 1003: 
 1004:     {error, Error} =
 1005:         ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1006:                                  {save_accepted_host, false},
 1007:                                  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1008:                                  {user_interaction, false}]),
 1009:     check_error(Error),
 1010:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
 1011:

 1019:                                              {preferred_algorithms, ssh_transport:supported_algorithms()},
 1020: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
 1021: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),

 1024:                                           {silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1025: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1026: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),

 1037:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),

 1039:                                              {preferred_algorithms, ssh_transport:supported_algorithms()},
 1040: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
 1041:                                              {parallel_login, true},

 1043:     ConnectionRef =
 1044: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{preferred_algorithms, ssh_transport:supported_algorithms()},
 1045:                                           {silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1046: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1047: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
 1048:     {ok, ChannelId} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
 1049:     ok = ssh_connection:send(ConnectionRef, ChannelId, <<"Data">>),
 1050:     ok = ssh_connection:send(ConnectionRef, ChannelId, << >>),
 1051:     ssh_info:print(fun(Fmt, Args) -> io:fwrite(user, Fmt, Args) end),
 1052:     {Parents, Conns, Handshakers} =
 1053:         ssh_test_lib:find_handshake_parent(Port),

 1056: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1057: %%% Test ssh:connection_info([peername, sockname])
 1058: peername_sockname(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1059:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1060:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
 1061:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1062: 
 1063:     {_Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
 1064: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
 1065: 					     {subsystems, [{"peername_sockname",
 1066: 							    {ssh_peername_sockname_server, []}}
 1067: 							  ]}
 1068: 					    ]),
 1069:     ConnectionRef =
 1070: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1071: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1072: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
 1073:     {ok, ChannelId} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
 1074:     success = ssh_connection:subsystem(ConnectionRef, ChannelId, "peername_sockname", infinity),
 1075:     [{peer, {_Name, {HostPeerClient,PortPeerClient} = ClientPeer}}] =
 1076: 	ssh:connection_info(ConnectionRef, [peer]),
 1077:     [{sockname, {HostSockClient,PortSockClient} = ClientSock}] =
 1078: 	ssh:connection_info(ConnectionRef, [sockname]),
 1079:     ct:log("Client: ~p ~p", [ClientPeer, ClientSock]),
 1080:     receive
 1081: 	{ssh_cm, ConnectionRef, {data, ChannelId, _, Response}} ->
 1082: 	    {PeerNameSrv,SockNameSrv} = binary_to_term(Response),
 1083: 	    {HostPeerSrv,PortPeerSrv} = PeerNameSrv,
 1084: 	    {HostSockSrv,PortSockSrv} = SockNameSrv,
 1085: 	    ct:log("Server: ~p ~p", [PeerNameSrv, SockNameSrv]),
 1086: 	    host_equal(HostPeerSrv, HostSockClient),
 1087: 	    PortPeerSrv = PortSockClient,
 1088: 	    host_equal(HostSockSrv, HostPeerClient),
 1089: 	    PortSockSrv = PortPeerClient,
 1090: 	    host_equal(HostSockSrv, Host),
 1091: 	    PortSockSrv = Port
 1092:     after 10000 ->
 1093: 	    ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
 1094:     end.
 1095: 
 1096: host_equal(H1, H2) ->
 1097:     not ordsets:is_disjoint(ips(H1), ips(H2)).
 1098: 
 1099: ips(IP) when is_tuple(IP) -> ordsets:from_list([IP]);
 1100: ips(Name) when is_list(Name) ->
 1101:     {ok,#hostent{h_addr_list=IPs4}} = inet:gethostbyname(Name,inet),
 1102:     {ok,#hostent{h_addr_list=IPs6}} = inet:gethostbyname(Name,inet6),
 1103:     ordsets:from_list(IPs4++IPs6).
 1104: 
 1105: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1106: 
 1107: %%% Client receives close when server closes
 1108: close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1109:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1110:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
 1111:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1112:     
 1113:     {Server, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
 1114: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
 1115: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
 1116:     Client =
 1117: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1118: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1119: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
 1120:     {ok, ChannelId} = ssh_connection:session_channel(Client, infinity),
 1121:     
 1122:     ssh:stop_daemon(Server),
 1123:     receive 
 1124: 	{ssh_cm, Client,{closed, ChannelId}} ->  
 1125: 	    ok
 1126:     after 5000 ->
 1127: 	    ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
 1128:     end.
 1129: 
 1130: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1131: %%% Simulate that we try to close an already closed connection
 1132: double_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1133:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1134:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
 1135:     UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir, nopubkey), % to make sure we don't use public-key-auth
 1136:     file:make_dir(UserDir),
 1137: 
 1138:     {_Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
 1139: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
 1140: 					     {user_passwords, [{"vego", "morot"}]},
 1141: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
 1142:     CM = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1143: 					   {user_dir, UserDir},
 1144: 					    {user, "vego"},
 1145: 					    {password, "morot"},
 1146: 					    {user_interaction, false}]),
 1147:     
 1148:     exit(CM, {shutdown, normal}),
 1149:     ok = ssh:close(CM).
 1150: 
 1151: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1152: daemon_opt_fd(Config) ->
 1153:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1154:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
 1155:     UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir, nopubkey), % to make sure we don't use public-key-auth
 1156:     file:make_dir(UserDir),
 1157: 
 1158:     {ok,S1} = gen_tcp:listen(0,[]),
 1159:     ct:log("Socket S1 = ~p", [S1]),
 1160:     
 1161:     {ok,Fd1} = prim_inet:getfd(S1),
 1162:     
 1163:     {ok,Pid1} = ssh:daemon(0, [{system_dir, SystemDir},
 1164: 			       {fd,Fd1},
 1165: 			       {user_dir, UserDir},
 1166: 			       {user_passwords, [{"vego", "morot"}]},
 1167: 			       {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
 1168:     
 1169:     {ok,{_Host1,Port1}} = inet:sockname(S1),
 1170:     C1 = ssh_test_lib:connect(Port1, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1171: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1172: 					  {user, "vego"},
 1173: 					  {password, "morot"},
 1174: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
 1175:     exit(C1, {shutdown, normal}),
 1176:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid1),
 1177:     gen_tcp:close(S1).
 1178: 
 1179: 
 1180: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1181: multi_daemon_opt_fd(Config) ->
 1182:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1183:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
 1184:     UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir, nopubkey), % to make sure we don't use public-key-auth
 1185:     file:make_dir(UserDir),
 1186: 
 1187:     Test = 
 1188: 	fun() ->
 1189: 		{ok,S} = gen_tcp:listen(0,[]),
 1190:                 ct:log("Socket S = ~p", [S]),
 1191: 		{ok,Fd} = prim_inet:getfd(S),
 1192: 
 1193: 		{ok,Pid} = ssh:daemon(0, [{system_dir, SystemDir},
 1194: 					  {fd,Fd},
 1195: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1196: 					  {user_passwords, [{"vego", "morot"}]},
 1197: 					  {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
 1198: 
 1199: 		{ok,{_Host,Port}} = inet:sockname(S),
 1200: 		C = ssh_test_lib:connect(Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1201: 							  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1202: 							  {user, "vego"},
 1203: 							  {password, "morot"},
 1204: 							  {user_interaction, false}]),
 1205: 		{S,Pid,C}
 1206: 	end,
 1207: 
 1208:     Tests = [Test(),Test(),Test(),Test(),Test(),Test()],
 1209: 
 1210:     [begin 
 1211: 	 gen_tcp:close(S),
 1212: 	 ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
 1213: 	 exit(C, {shutdown, normal})
 1214:      end || {S,Pid,C} <- Tests].
 1215: 
 1216: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1217: packet_size(Config) ->
 1218:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1219:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
 1220:     UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir, nopubkey), % to make sure we don't use public-key-auth
 1221:     file:make_dir(UserDir),
 1222: 
 1223:     {Server, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
 1224: 						{user_dir, UserDir},
 1225: 						{user_passwords, [{"vego", "morot"}]}]),
 1226:     Conn =
 1227: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1228: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1229: 					  {user_interaction, false},
 1230: 					  {user, "vego"},
 1231: 					  {password, "morot"}]),
 1232:     lists:foreach(
 1233:       fun(MaxPacketSize) ->
 1234:               ct:log("Try max_packet_size=~p",[MaxPacketSize]),
 1235:               {ok,Ch} = ssh_connection:session_channel(Conn, 1000, MaxPacketSize, 60000),
 1236:               ok = ssh_connection:shell(Conn, Ch),
 1237:               rec(Server, Conn, Ch, MaxPacketSize),
 1238:               ssh_connection:close(Conn, Ch)
 1239:       end, [0, 1, 10, 25]),
 1240: 
 1241:     ssh:close(Conn),
 1242:     ssh:stop_daemon(Server),
 1243:     ok.
 1244: 
 1245: 
 1246: rec(Server, Conn, Ch, MaxSz) ->
 1247:     receive
 1248:         {ssh_cm,Conn,{data,Ch,_,M}} when byte_size(M) =< MaxSz ->
 1249:             ct:log("~p: ~p",[MaxSz,M]),
 1250:             rec(Server, Conn, Ch, MaxSz);
 1251:         {ssh_cm,Conn,{data,Ch,_,_}} = M ->
 1252:             ct:log("Max pkt size=~p. Got ~p",[MaxSz,M]),
 1253:             ssh:close(Conn),
 1254:             ssh:stop_daemon(Server),
 1255:             ct:fail("Does not obey max_packet_size=~p",[MaxSz])
 1256:     after
 1257:         2000 -> 
 1258:             ct:log("~p: ok!",[MaxSz]),
 1259:             ok
 1260:     end.
 1261: 
 1262: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1263: shell_no_unicode(Config) ->
 1264:     new_do_shell(proplists:get_value(io,Config),
 1265: 		 [new_prompt,
 1266: 		  {type,"io:format(\"hej ~p~n\",[42])."},
 1267: 		  {expect,"hej 42"},
 1268: 		  {expect,"ok"},
 1269: 		  new_prompt,
 1270: 		  {type,"exit()."}
 1271: 		 ]).
 1272: 	      
 1273: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1274: shell_unicode_string(Config) ->
 1275:     new_do_shell(proplists:get_value(io,Config),
 1276: 		 [new_prompt,
 1277: 		  {type,"io:format(\"~ts~n\",[\"\"])."},
 1278: 		  {expect,""},
 1279: 		  {expect,"ok"},
 1280: 		  new_prompt,
 1281: 		  {type,"exit()."}
 1282: 		 ]).
 1283: 
 1284: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1285: %%% Test basic connection with openssh_zlib
 1286: openssh_zlib_basic_test(Config) ->
 1287:     case ssh_test_lib:ssh_supports(['zlib@openssh.com',none], compression) of
 1288: 	{false,L} ->
 1289: 	    {skip, io_lib:format("~p compression is not supported",[L])};
 1290: 
 1291: 	true ->
 1292: 	    SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
 1293: 	    UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1294: 
 1295: 	    {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
 1296: 						     {user_dir, UserDir},
 1297: 						     {preferred_algorithms,[{compression, ['zlib@openssh.com']}]},
 1298: 						     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
 1299: 	    ConnectionRef =
 1300: 		ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1301: 						  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1302: 						  {user_interaction, false},
 1303: 						  {preferred_algorithms,[{compression, ['zlib@openssh.com',
 1304: 											none]}]}
 1305: 						 ]),
 1306: 	    ok = ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
 1307: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid)
 1308:     end.
 1309: 
 1310: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1311: ssh_info_print(Config) ->
 1312:     %% Just check that ssh_print:info() crashes
 1313:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1314:     PrintFile = filename:join(PrivDir,info),
 1315:     UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir, nopubkey), % to make sure we don't use public-key-auth
 1316:     file:make_dir(UserDir),
 1317:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1318: 
 1319:     Parent = self(),
 1320:     UnexpFun = fun(Msg,_Peer) ->
 1321: 		       Parent ! {unexpected,Msg,self()},
 1322: 		       skip
 1323: 	       end,
 1324:     ConnFun = fun(_,_,_) -> Parent ! {connect,self()} end,
 1325: 
 1326:     {DaemonRef, Host, Port} = 
 1327: 	ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
 1328: 			     {user_dir, UserDir},
 1329: 			     {password, "morot"},
 1330: 			     {unexpectedfun, UnexpFun},
 1331: 			     {connectfun, ConnFun},
 1332: 			     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
 1333:     ClientConnRef1 =
 1334: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1335: 					  {user, "foo"},
 1336: 					  {password, "morot"},
 1337: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1338: 					  {unexpectedfun, UnexpFun},
 1339: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
 1340:     ClientConnRef2 =
 1341: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1342: 					  {user, "foo"},
 1343: 					  {password, "morot"},
 1344: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1345: 					  {unexpectedfun, UnexpFun},
 1346: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
 1347:     receive
 1348: 	{connect,DaemonConnRef} ->
 1349: 	    ct:log("DaemonRef=~p, DaemonConnRef=~p, ClientConnRefs=~p",[DaemonRef, DaemonConnRef, 
 1350: 									[ClientConnRef1,ClientConnRef2]
 1351: 								       ])
 1352:     after 2000 ->
 1353: 	    ok
 1354:     end,
 1355: 
 1356:     {ok,D} = file:open(PrintFile, write),
 1357:     ssh_info:print(D),
 1358:     ok = file:close(D),
 1359: 
 1360:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(PrintFile),
 1361:     ct:log("~s",[Bin]),
 1362: 
 1363:     receive
 1364: 	{unexpected, Msg, Pid} ->
 1365: 	    ct:log("~p got unexpected msg ~p",[Pid,Msg]),
 1366: 	    ct:log("process_info(~p) = ~n~p",[Pid,process_info(Pid)]),
 1367: 	    ok = ssh:close(ClientConnRef1),
 1368: 	    ok = ssh:close(ClientConnRef2),
 1369: 	    ok = ssh:stop_daemon(DaemonRef),
 1370: 	    {fail,"unexpected msg"}
 1371:     after 1000 ->
 1372: 	    ok = ssh:close(ClientConnRef1),
 1373: 	    ok = ssh:close(ClientConnRef2),
 1374: 	    ok = ssh:stop_daemon(DaemonRef)
 1375:     end.
 1376: 
 1377: 
 1378: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1379: %% Check that a basd pwd is not tried more times. Could cause lock-out
 1380: %% on server
 1381: 
 1382: login_bad_pwd_no_retry1(Config) ->
 1383:     login_bad_pwd_no_retry(Config, "keyboard-interactive,password").
 1384: 
 1385: login_bad_pwd_no_retry2(Config) ->
 1386:     login_bad_pwd_no_retry(Config, "password,keyboard-interactive").
 1387: 
 1388: login_bad_pwd_no_retry3(Config) ->
 1389:     login_bad_pwd_no_retry(Config, "password,publickey,keyboard-interactive").
 1390: 
 1391: login_bad_pwd_no_retry4(Config) ->
 1392:     login_bad_pwd_no_retry(Config, "password,keyboard-interactive").
 1393: 
 1394: login_bad_pwd_no_retry5(Config) ->
 1395:     login_bad_pwd_no_retry(Config, "password,keyboard-interactive,password,password").
 1396: 
 1397: 
 1398: login_bad_pwd_no_retry(Config, AuthMethods) ->
 1399:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1400:     UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir, nopubkey), % to make sure we don't use public-key-auth
 1401:     file:make_dir(UserDir),
 1402:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1403: 
 1404:     Parent = self(),
 1405:     PwdFun = fun(_, _, _, undefined) -> {false, 1};
 1406: 		(_, _, _,         _) -> Parent ! retry_bad_pwd,
 1407: 					false
 1408: 	     end,
 1409: 
 1410:     {DaemonRef, _Host, Port} = 
 1411: 	ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
 1412: 			     {user_dir, UserDir},
 1413: 			     {auth_methods, AuthMethods},
 1414: 			     {user_passwords, [{"foo","somepwd"}]},
 1415: 			     {pwdfun, PwdFun}
 1416: 			    ]),
 1417: 
 1418:     ConnRes = ssh:connect("localhost", Port,
 1419: 			  [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1420: 			   {user, "foo"},
 1421: 			   {password, "badpwd"},
 1422: 			   {user_dir, UserDir},
 1423: 			   {user_interaction, false}]),
 1424: 
 1425:     receive
 1426: 	retry_bad_pwd ->
 1427: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(DaemonRef),
 1428: 	    {fail, "Retry bad password"}
 1429:     after 0 ->
 1430: 	    case ConnRes of
 1431: 		{error,"Unable to connect using the available authentication methods"} ->
 1432: 		    ssh:stop_daemon(DaemonRef),
 1433: 		    ok;
 1434: 		{ok,Conn} ->
 1435: 		    ssh:close(Conn),
 1436: 		    ssh:stop_daemon(DaemonRef),
 1437: 		    {fail, "Connect erroneosly succeeded"}
 1438: 	    end
 1439:     end.
 1440: 
 1441: 
 1442: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1443: %%% Test that when shell REPL exit with reason normal client receives status 0
 1444: shell_exit_status(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1445:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1446:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1447:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1448: 
 1449:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
 1450:                                              {user_dir, UserDir},
 1451:                                              {user_passwords, [{"vego", "morot"}]},
 1452:                                              {shell, {?MODULE,always_ok,[]}},
 1453:                                              {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
 1454:     ConnectionRef =
 1455:         ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1456:                                           {user_dir, UserDir},
 1457:                                           {user, "vego"},
 1458:                                           {password, "morot"},
 1459:                                           {user_interaction, false}]),
 1460: 
 1461:     {ok, ChannelId} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
 1462:     ok = ssh_connection:shell(ConnectionRef, ChannelId),
 1463:     ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_end(ConnectionRef, ChannelId),
 1464:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
 1465: 
 1466: always_ok(_) -> ok.
 1467:     
 1468: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1469: setopts_getopts(Config) ->
 1470:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1471:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1472:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1473: 
 1474:     ShellFun = fun (_User, _Peer) -> spawn(fun() -> ok end) end,
 1475:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
 1476:                                              {user_dir, UserDir},
 1477:                                              {user_passwords, [{"vego", "morot"}]},
 1478:                                              {shell, ShellFun},
 1479:                                              {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
 1480:     ConnectionRef =
 1481:         ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1482:                                           {quiet_mode, true}, % Just to use quiet_mode once
 1483:                                           {user_dir, UserDir},
 1484:                                           {user, "vego"},
 1485:                                           {password, "morot"},
 1486:                                           {user_interaction, false}]),
 1487:     %% Test get_sock_opts
 1488:     {ok,[{active,once},{deliver,term},{mode,binary},{packet,0}]} =
 1489:         ssh:get_sock_opts(ConnectionRef, [active, deliver, mode, packet]),
 1490: 
 1491:     %% Test to set forbidden opts
 1492:     {error,{not_allowed,[active,deliver,mode,packet]}} =
 1493:         ssh:set_sock_opts(ConnectionRef, [{active,once},{deliver,term},{mode,binary},{packet,0}]),
 1494:     
 1495:     %% Test to set some other opt
 1496:     {ok,[{delay_send,DS0}]} =
 1497:         ssh:get_sock_opts(ConnectionRef, [delay_send]),
 1498:     DS1 = not DS0,
 1499:     ok = ssh:set_sock_opts(ConnectionRef, [{delay_send,DS1}]),
 1500:     {ok,[{delay_send,DS1}]} =
 1501:         ssh:get_sock_opts(ConnectionRef, [delay_send]),
 1502:     
 1503:      ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
 1504: 
 1505: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1506: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
 1507: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1508: %% Due to timing the error message may or may not be delivered to
 1509: %% the "tcp-application" before the socket closed message is received
 1510: check_error("Invalid state") -> ok;
 1511: check_error("Connection closed") -> ok;
 1512: check_error("Selection of key exchange algorithm failed"++_) -> ok;
 1513: check_error("No host key available") -> ok;
 1514: check_error(Error) -> ct:fail(Error).
 1515: 
 1516: basic_test(Config) ->
 1517:     ClientOpts = proplists:get_value(client_opts, Config),
 1518:     ServerOpts = proplists:get_value(server_opts, Config),
 1519:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon(ServerOpts),
 1520:     CM = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, ClientOpts),
 1521:     ok = ssh:close(CM),
 1522:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
 1523: 
 1524: do_shell(IO, _Shell) ->
 1525:     new_do_shell(IO, [new_prompt,
 1526:                       {type,"1+1."},
 1527:                       {expect,"2"},
 1528:                       new_prompt,
 1529:                       {type,"exit()."}
 1530:                      ]).
 1531: 
 1532: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1533: wait_for_erlang_first_line(Config) ->
 1534:     receive
 1535: 	{'EXIT', _, _} = Exit ->
 1536:             ct:log("~p:~p ~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,Exit]),
 1537: 	    {fail,no_ssh_connection};
 1538: 	<<"Eshell ",_/binary>> = _ErlShellStart ->
 1539: 	    ct:log("Erlang shell start: ~p~n", [_ErlShellStart]),
 1540: 	    Config;
 1541: 	Other ->
 1542: 	    ct:log("Unexpected answer from ssh server: ~p",[Other]),
 1543: 	    {fail,unexpected_answer}
 1544:     after 10000 ->
 1545: 	    ct:log("No answer from ssh-server"),
 1546: 	    {fail,timeout}
 1547:     end.
 1548: 
 1549: 
 1550: 
 1551: new_do_shell(IO, List) -> new_do_shell(IO, 0, List).
 1552: 
 1553: new_do_shell(IO, N, [new_prompt|More]) ->
 1554:     new_do_shell(IO, N+1, More);
 1555: 
 1556: new_do_shell(IO, N, Ops=[{Order,Arg}|More]) ->
 1557:     Pfx = prompt_prefix(),
 1558:     PfxSize = byte_size(Pfx),
 1559:     receive
 1560: 	_X = <<"\r\n">> ->
 1561: 	    ct:log("Skip newline ~p",[_X]),
 1562: 	    new_do_shell(IO, N, Ops);
 1563: 	
 1564: 	<<P1,"> ">> when (P1-$0)==N -> 
 1565: 	    new_do_shell_prompt(IO, N, Order, Arg, More);
 1566: 	<<"(",Pfx:PfxSize/binary,")",P1,"> ">> when (P1-$0)==N -> 
 1567: 	    new_do_shell_prompt(IO, N, Order, Arg, More);
 1568: 	<<"('",Pfx:PfxSize/binary,"')",P1,"> ">> when (P1-$0)==N -> 
 1569: 	    new_do_shell_prompt(IO, N, Order, Arg, More);
 1570: 
 1571: 	<<P1,P2,"> ">> when (P1-$0)*10 + (P2-$0) == N -> 
 1572: 	    new_do_shell_prompt(IO, N, Order, Arg, More);
 1573: 	<<"(",Pfx:PfxSize/binary,")",P1,P2,"> ">> when (P1-$0)*10 + (P2-$0) == N -> 
 1574: 	    new_do_shell_prompt(IO, N, Order, Arg, More);
 1575: 	<<"('",Pfx:PfxSize/binary,"')",P1,P2,"> ">> when (P1-$0)*10 + (P2-$0) == N -> 
 1576: 	    new_do_shell_prompt(IO, N, Order, Arg, More);
 1577: 
 1578: 	<<P1,P2,P3,"> ">> when (P1-$0)*100 + (P2-$0)*10 + (P3-$0) == N -> 
 1579: 	    new_do_shell_prompt(IO, N, Order, Arg, More);
 1580: 	<<"(",Pfx:PfxSize/binary,")",P1,P2,P3,"> ">> when (P1-$0)*100 + (P2-$0)*10 + (P3-$0) == N -> 
 1581: 	    new_do_shell_prompt(IO, N, Order, Arg, More);
 1582: 	<<"('",Pfx:PfxSize/binary,"')",P1,P2,P3,"> ">> when (P1-$0)*100 + (P2-$0)*10 + (P3-$0) == N -> 
 1583: 	    new_do_shell_prompt(IO, N, Order, Arg, More);
 1584: 
 1585: 	Err when element(1,Err)==error ->
 1586: 	    ct:fail("new_do_shell error: ~p~n",[Err]);
 1587: 
 1588: 	RecBin when Order==expect ; Order==expect_echo ->
 1589: 	    ct:log("received ~p",[RecBin]),
 1590: 	    RecStr = string:strip(unicode:characters_to_list(RecBin)),
 1591: 	    ExpStr = string:strip(Arg),
 1592: 	    case lists:prefix(ExpStr, RecStr) of
 1593: 		true when Order==expect ->
 1594: 		    ct:log("Matched ~ts",[RecStr]),
 1595: 		    new_do_shell(IO, N, More);
 1596: 		true when Order==expect_echo ->
 1597: 		    ct:log("Matched echo ~ts",[RecStr]),
 1598: 		    new_do_shell(IO, N, More);
 1599: 		false ->
 1600: 		    ct:log("*** Expected ~p, but got ~p",[string:strip(ExpStr),RecStr]),
 1601:             new_do_shell(IO, N, Ops)
 1602: 	    end
 1603:     after 30000 ->
 1604: 	    ct:log("Message queue of ~p:~n~p",
 1605: 		   [self(), erlang:process_info(self(), messages)]),
 1606: 	    case Order of
 1607: 		expect -> ct:fail("timeout, expected ~p",[string:strip(Arg)]);
 1608: 		type ->  ct:fail("timeout, no prompt")
 1609: 	    end
 1610:     end;
 1611: 
 1612: new_do_shell(_, _, []) ->
 1613:     ok.
 1614: 
 1615: prompt_prefix() ->
 1616:     case node() of
 1617: 	nonode@nohost -> <<>>;
 1618: 	Node -> list_to_binary(
 1619:                   atom_to_list(Node))
 1620:     end.
 1621: 	    
 1622: 
 1623: new_do_shell_prompt(IO, N, type, Str, More) ->
 1624:     ct:log("Matched prompt ~p to trigger sending of next line to server",[N]),
 1625:     IO ! {input, self(), Str++"\r\n"},
 1626:     ct:log("Prompt '~p> ', Sent ~ts",[N,Str++"\r\n"]),
 1627:     new_do_shell(IO, N, More);
 1628: new_do_shell_prompt(IO, N, Op, Str, More) ->
 1629:     ct:log("Matched prompt ~p",[N]),
 1630:     new_do_shell(IO, N, [{Op,Str}|More]).
 1631:
